name: ConceptMapR5SubstanceElementsForR4Substance
title: Cross-version ConceptMap for FHIR R5 resources in FHIR R4
description: This ConceptMap represents the cross-version mapping of resource FHIR R5 for use in FHIR R4.

target.comment:
FHIR R5 Resource `Substance` is representable via FHIR R4B Resource `Substance`.
Element `Substance` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Substance`.
Element `Substance.meta` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Substance.meta`.
Element `Substance.implicitRules` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Substance.implicitRules`.
Element `Substance.language` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Substance.language`.
Element `Substance.text` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Substance.text`.
Element `Substance.contained` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Substance.contained`.
Element `Substance.identifier` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Substance.identifier`.
Element `Substance.instance` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Substance.instance`.
Element `Substance.status` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Substance.status`.
Element `Substance.status` is mapped to FHIR DSTU2 structure `Substance`, but has no target element specified.
Element `Substance.category` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Substance.category`.
Element `Substance.code` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Substance.code`.
Element `Substance.description` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Substance.description`.
Element `Substance.expiry` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Substance.instance.expiry`.
Element `Substance.quantity` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Substance.instance.quantity`.
Element `Substance.ingredient` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Substance.ingredient`.
Element `Substance.ingredient.quantity` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Substance.ingredient.quantity`.

Note that the target element context `Substance.ingredient.substance[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `Substance.ingredient`.
Element `Substance.ingredient.substance[x]` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Substance.ingredient.substance[x]`.
Note that the target element context `Substance.ingredient.substance[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `Substance.ingredient`.
Element `Substance.ingredient.substance[x]` is mapped to FHIR DSTU2 element `Substance.ingredient.substance`.
